name: skillwap-api
description: SkillSwap is a TypeScript-powered web application using Express.js, designed for community members to exchange skills and services seamlessly. With features like Firebase Authentication, MariaDB integration, and a robust testing suite with Mocha, ESLint, and Prettier, SkillSwap provides a collaborative platform for skill-sharing within a community.
author: Angel S. Moreno <angelxmoreno@gmail.com>
